mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_qm_appeal_process_info
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from t_qm_appeal_process_info t1 right outer join t_qm_appeal_node_info t2 ON t1.PROCESS_ID = t2.PROCESS_ID where t1.PARENT_PROCESS_ID = #{parentProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
